Name: OplitisAV
About the game: OplitisAV is a game made by 3 IT students. You are a Ferocious Anti-virus Systemic Trucidator (FAST), you are injected in an infected system, and your sole objective is to eradicate all virus life forms. The game is a 3d top-down shooter based on an arcade fashion. You have one mission: overcome the system infection, but don't worry! Killing enemies always returns some useful data, which can be used to upgrade your code and become even more powerful for the next injection.
